There is a law on a minimum temperature employees can work in, which is 16 Degrees C. or 13 Degrees C if doing any manual work. But there is only a recomizdation on Heat Temperature in a Private Rented Accommodation to being around 21 Degrees C.

This needs to be updated to be a LAW & not just a recomizdation as we tennants are being exploited by land Lords/Ladies who won't have the heating on either, high enough or even for long enough at night.
